about_the_game:
Dante’s Ring is an action-adventure RPG with survival and arcade elements, where you engage in a disaster combat, and confront the deadliest forces of nature — from raging fires and molten lava to powerful earthquakes.

WHO WILL YOU BE?

You take on the role of one of the bold explorers investigating what appears to be an extinct volcanic range. Strive to survive and save as many lives as possible while facing the force of nature, the aftermath of a natural disaster, deep-seated human beliefs, social conflicts, and your own inner demons. Will you uncover the mysteries hidden beneath Dante's archipelago, the most seismically and volcanically active zone in the world?

WHAT AWAITS YOU?

You will fight the nature's wrath among mystical beliefs by using retro-stylized equipment, like a thermovisor and shooter-style, live-saving weapons (eg. extinguishing shotgun, fire bomb launcher, and more). Use tools such as axes and hammers to break through walls in burning buildings to reach those in need. Rappel across rivers of lava and be aware of exploding vehicles, volcanic bombs, and earthquakes that change the map layout, sometimes cutting your way of escape entirely.

Will you fight a frenetic fire or flee from a pyroclastic flow? Break the door to rescue someone or stop to give a first aid? Once the volcano’s hot breath reaches you, every second counts.

Dante's Ring offers a fresh approach to gameplay, focusing on disaster combat and immersing you in a mesmerizing, eerie world where you pass through the gates of hell to save just one more life from its grasp.

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

  • Traverse an extremely dangerous terrain by using retro inventions.

  • Use live-saving weapons such as a fire extinguishing pistol, fire extinguishing shotgun, fire bomb launcher and more.

  • Solve intricate puzzles, break through obstacles, and carefully manage your supplies.

  • Find your own way to save people and animals.

  • Prepare for missions in the hub by selecting the equipment for your preferred gameplay styles/classes.

  • Complete quests and missions with outcomes that can influence the course of the story.

  • Scavenge for resources using retro tools on an island covered in a thick layer of ash.

  • Navigate complex moral choices and broker uneasy peace among diverse factions — all vying for survival.

  • Uncover the mystery hidden in Dante's archipelago.

  • Surround yourself with retrofuturistic designs and captivating music.

Inspired by Ryszard Kapuściński’s famous books.
